page.title: 08TREVOLLARD FARMER:TREMATON
page.content: The present owner and his wife have two children, a boy of eight and a girl of three. Because of the distance involved, the children are provided with transport by the Education Authority to go to school. This is a lonley area with few children to play with although there is plenty of open ground on which to play. The nearest shops are abut three miles away. Milk is delivered to the farm about three times a week. Despite being alone, the farmer has time for some hobbies, particularly golf, bridge and gardening.
